page.title: 05 CLUBS
page.content: Sark has many clubs or orginisations that we can go to. The Riding Club is one of the more recent ones and it was formed at the beginning of 1984. It has about 15 riding members and 10 non-riding members who also ride in Guernsey. One of the clubs held on a Sunday is called the Star Club, a methodist organisation run by Sister Gladys. It started in 1984 and children from the age of 7 years can join.There are about 12 members. Manse Youth group, (M.Y.G.) is also run by Sister Gladys on a Wednesday evening for the older children,9 years and above. She also runs a mini M.Y.G. for the younger children. This is run on Fridays from 6.00 to 7.30p.m. The Loyalty Lodge hold their A.G.M.'s in the Mermaid, one of the three main pubs.
